correction_response:
This tweet is somewhat misleading. While it's true that a select committee has been established, it's not specifically named the "Select Committee on Insurrection Protection". The committee is aimed at investigating federal law enforcement agencies, which some Democrats have interpreted as an attempt to obstruct justice and protect those involved in insurrection. However, not all Republicans agree with this interpretation, with some arguing it's about addressing law enforcement abuses that transcend partisanship. 
References: 
https://democraticleader.house.gov/media/press-releases/video-leader-jeffries-floor-speech-extreme-maga-republican-march-criminalize
https://www.axios.com/2023/01/11/republican-federal-law-enforcement-weaponization
note_1_text: The actual committee is the "Select Subcommittee on the Weaponization of the Federal Government", chaired by Representative Jim Jordan, Republican of Ohio.  It was passed 221-211 with all Democrats opposed.    https://www.nytimes.com/2023/01/10/us/politics/house-republican-committee-weaponization-government.html  https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/house-vote-weaponization-federal-government-panel-1st-week/story?id=96342735
note_2_text: As of January 11, 2023, there is no committee with that name active in the House of Representatives.    https://www.house.gov/committees
queries:
1. "Extreme MAGA Republicans Select Committee on Insurrection Protection"
2. "Fact check: Select Committee on Insurrection Protection"
3. "News about Republicans establishing a committee on insurrection protection"

We oppose an Extreme MAGA Republican agenda and let's get back to the business of the American people. - House Republicans are gearing up for a sprawling, multi-pronged investigation into federal law enforcement agencies, voting on Tuesday to establish a select committee to investigate the 'weaponization' of the federal government. Reference: https://www.axios.com/2023/01/11/republican-federal-law-enforcement-weaponization published on 2023-01-11 01:14:10
tweet_text: Extreme MAGA Republicans have established a Select Committee on Insurrection Protection. We will fight it tooth and nail.
